activities: Processing of transaction data relating to the sale of goods or services, typically via the Internet, to (i) detect unauthorized uses of credit cards, other forms of payment abuse or fraudulent abuse of our client's websites, products or services, (ii) provide clients with chargeback management process services including tools to enable review and analysis of payment disputes, (iii) provide payment gateway services to our clients, and (iv) provide other related transaction data management services to our clients.
eucountries: Bulgaria, Denmark, France, Germany, Ireland, Netherlands, Poland, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Consumer transaction data associated with card-not-present purchases of goods and services
privacyprograms:
Accertify meets the data security standards set forth in the Payment Card Industry Data Security Standards (PCI-DSS) and is certified as a Level 1 organization.
Accertify was initially certified ISO 27001 compliant on July 15, 2011 and was recertified on July 3, 2014.
Accertify participates in the BBB EU Safe Harbor Program.
